intent_atoms.description: Parse mdhd (Media Header) boxes to expose media header metadata in CLI exports, streaming pipeline, and SwiftUI detail panes.
Parser must read versioned timestamps, timescale, duration, language, and reserved fields for both 32-bit and 64-bit layouts using FullBoxReader.
Language code decoding helpers are added and short payloads cause the parser to return nil instead of partial data.
Parser must always register with BoxParserRegistry so that all components can surface media header metadata.
Use FullBoxReader for reading mdhd boxes and return a structured ParsedBoxPayload.
Implement hdlr (handler) parser to finish remaining Phase C backlog item referenced in MVP checklists.

functional_units.name: mdhd Box Parser
functional_units.description: Parses mdhd (Media Header) boxes from ISO media files, extracting versioned timestamps, timescale, duration, language, and reserved fields into a structured ParsedBoxPayload for both 32-bit and 64‑bit layouts.
